data.Name: XpertSea
data.Tagline: Our AI-driven data management platform offers real-time insights making aquaculture more efficient and sustainable.
data.About: XpertSea is an aquaculture technology company that's transforming how the global aquaculture industry farms seafood to help feed the world. Their mission is to develop technologies that transform aquaculture into a modern, efficient and sustainable source of food for our planet. Through research and development of advanced technologies such as AI and computer vision, we’re increasing the availability of quality food, reducing the environmental impact of food production, and improving profitability across the aquaculture food chain.
